scenes.title: Scene 1: Opening Plays
scenes.description: The match starts with both teams displaying strong defense and midfield plays. Spurs and Arsenal players are seen contesting for the ball.

scenes.title: Scene 2: Aggressive Possession
scenes.description: Partey intercepts and passes to Udgard, leading to a crucial block by Romero to prevent a goal-scoring opportunity for Arsenal.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Corner Kick Set-up
scenes.description: The play leads to a corner for Arsenal, taken by Sacker, as the teams prepare for the set-piece.

scenes.title: Scene 4: The Opening Goal
scenes.description: The corner results in a goal for Arsenal, as seen by the scoreboard changing to TOT 0-1 ARS in the final frame.

scenes.title: Scene 5: Controversial Own Goal
scenes.description: The Arsenal team celebrates a goal, which commentators speculate could be an own goal by Hojbjerg.

scenes.title: Scene 6: Rebuilding the Play
scenes.description: Maddison switches the play, and there's a noticeable momentum shift as Spurs regain possession.

scenes.title: Scene 7: Spurs Attempt to Strike
scenes.description: Spurs move forward with Kunasewski being fouled, indicating an increase in intensity by Spurs in their attack.

scenes.title: Scene 8: Near Miss
scenes.description: A failed penalty appeal by Maddison as Spurs push for an equalizer.

scenes.title: Scene 9: Arsenal's Counter-attack
scenes.description: Saka expands Arsenal's advantage with a swift counter-attack, resulting in a second goal for Arsenal.

scenes.title: Scene 10: A Dominating Lead
scenes.description: Arsenal continues their domination as Havertz scores a header from Rice's corner, bringing the score to 3-0 in favor of Arsenal. The team's celebration is evident.

scenes.title: Scene 11: Advancing the Play
scenes.description: Following the goal, the play resumes with Arsenal in possession, maintaining their lead.

scenes.title: Scene 12: Tottenham's Resurgence
scenes.description: After a mistake from the Arsenal goalkeeper passing back to Zavid Raya, Tottenham intercepts and Romero finds the net, changing the score to TOT 1-3 ARS.

scenes.title: Scene 13: Continued Offensive
scenes.description: Tottenham maintains pressure as Sarr sends a drilled pass that almost connects with Romero for an additional goal.

scenes.title: Scene 14: Penalty Call
scenes.description: The play gets more aggressive leading to another Tottenham player being fouled in the area, prompting the referees to check for a possible penalty through VAR.

scenes.title: Scene 15: The Penalty Decision
scenes.description: VAR check confirms a penalty for Tottenham. Declan Rice is seen making contact with a Spurs player's leg.

scenes.title: Scene 1: Preparing for Penalty
scenes.description: Son Heung-Min prepares to take the penalty kick against goalkeeper Zavid Raya.

scenes.title: Scene 2: The Strike
scenes.description: Son Heung-Min successfully strikes the penalty, sending the goalkeeper the wrong way.

scenes.title: Scene 3: Narrowing the Gap
scenes.description: The score updates to Tottenham 2, Arsenal 3, as Son celebrates the goal, closing the lead Arsenal holds.

scenes.title: Scene 4: Resuming the Game
scenes.description: Players from both teams line up as the match resumes with Tottenham now only trailing by one goal.

scenes.title: Scene 5: The Final Whistle
scenes.description: The match concludes with the scoreboard showing Tottenham 2-3 Arsenal.

scenes.title: Scene 6: Arsenal's Celebration
scenes.description: Arsenal players are seen celebrating their victory on the field.

scenes.title: Scene 7: Credits
scenes.description: The video transitions to the credits indicative of conclusion.
